description:
We study the design and rigorous analysis of algorithms and data structures.
Topics may include dynamic programming, Fibonacci heaps, graph
algorithms, string algorithms, parallel algorithms, and concurrent data
structures.
title: Advanced Algorithms and Data Structures
prerequisite: YSC2229 Introductory Data Structures and Algorithms (or previously YSC2204 Fundamentals of Programming) or with the permission of the instructor.
